content: the charlie vest is a versatile addition to every child s wardrobe it can be styled for everyday or school wear making the best use of those variegated yarns and bright contrasting trims all children will love the pockets perfect for keeping precious treasures the pattern is sized from nb/15 10y/28 and is very economical on yarn yardage information **size yardage main colour/contrast colour ** nb/15 125/50 3m/16 150/75 6m/17 175/100 9m/18 200/100 12m/19 250/100 18m /20 250/100 24m/21 300/125 3y/22 350/125 4y/23 350/150 5y/24 375/150 6y/25 375/150 7y/26 400/150 8y/27 475/200 10y/28 575/200 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/indie-design-gift-a-long 2 http //www ravelry com/bundles/3894
